title: Luther v Calvin on pol authority and social order

content.question:
Directions: Suggested planning and writing time - 35 minutes.
In writing your essay, use specific examples to support your answer.
Compare and contrast the attitudes of Martin Luther and John Calvin toward political authority and social order.

skill.text: Skill 4.A: Identify and describe a historical context for a specific historical development or process.
